abstract: How do the two biggest deals in the social media world in recent years, those for Tumblr and Instagram, stack up to each other? DealBook runs through the stats.
snippet: How do the two biggest deals in the social media world in recent years, those for Tumblr and Instagram, stack up to each other? DealBook runs through the stats.
lead_paragraph: By agreeing to buy Tumblr for about $1.1 billion, Yahoo has struck the biggest social media deal in years, putting it up against the $1 billion* acquisition of Instagram by Facebook.

headline.main: The Tumblr and Instagram Deals: A Tale of the Tape

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
